document_data.name: Ola al-Farhan
document_data.mainbody: Princess '''Ola-al Farhan''' was the eldest daughter of Caliph [[Abir al-Farhan]] in [[Hilm]] in the [[Pantheist League]] of [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Ola was trained in the ways of the [[moralist]] and, with the church's blessing, would marry the next caliph in order to ensure her father's bloodline. She spent most of her time secluded in prayer. On the rare occasions when she ventured out into Hilm, the people showed their deep love for her by showering her feet with flowers.
